dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: President Tokayev in the Mangystau region, and they're talking about that Aktau Sea Port—it's a 24/7 operation now, handling cargo nonstop.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: President Tokayev in the Mangystau region, and they're talking about that Aktau Sea Port-it's a twenty four over seven operation now, handling cargo nonstop.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev was briefed on the development of transport and logistics infrastructure during his working visit to the Mangystau region, citing the Akorda press service. Currently, the port operates as a modern multipurpose terminal that ensures year-round, 24/7 cargo handling along the East"West and North"South routes.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and it's a huge deal for Kazakhstan's transit routes, right? East-West, North-South… that's like the crossroads of everything.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and it's a huge deal for Kazakhstan's transit routes, right? East-West, North-South... that's like the crossroads of everything.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Currently, the port operates as a modern multipurpose terminal that ensures year-round, 24/7 cargo handling along the East"West and North"South routes. Its strategic location at the intersection of international transport corridors reinforces both national and regional logistics networks.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And get this—cargo volume on the Trans-Caspian route jumped 62% just last year. Four point five million tonnes!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And get this-cargo volume on the Trans-Caspian route jumped sixty two percent just last year. Four point five million tonnes!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In 2024, cargo volume along the Trans-Caspian International Transport Route increased by 62 percent, reaching 4.5 million tonnes.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Whoa, that's massive. And they're aiming for ten million by 2028? That's ambitious.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Whoa, that's massive. And they're aiming for ten million by twenty twenty eight? That's ambitious.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: By 2028, the volume is expected to reach 10 million tonnes.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. Plus, they're building this container hub to boost capacity from 140,000 to 240,000 TEUs. That's not small potatoes.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. Plus, they're building this container hub to boost capacity from one hundred forty thousand to two hundred forty thousand TEUs. That's not small potatoes.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A container hub is currently under construction in Aktau, which will increase the port's capacity from 140,000 to 240,000 TEUs.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And it's not just the port—they're also working on a new airport in Kenderli, meant to handle 150 passengers an hour.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And it's not just the port-they're also working on a new airport in Kenderli, meant to handle one hundred fifty passengers an hour.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In accordance with the President's instruction, construction of a new airport has begun in the Kenderli resort zone. It will have a capacity of 150 passengers per hour.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, with flights to Almaty and Astana, which makes sense for tourism and business. But the road projects are wild too—Center-West, Beineu-Saksaulsky…
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, with flights to Almaty and Astana, which makes sense for tourism and business. But the road projects are wild too-Center-West, Beineu-Saksaulsky...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Regular flights connecting Kenderli with Almaty and Astana are planned, the Akorda press service stated. Major road infrastructure projects, including the Center"West and Beineu"Saksaulsky routes, are also underway.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Cutting the distance from Astana to Aktau by 800 kilometers? That's gonna save so much time and money for logistics.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Cutting the distance from Astana to Aktau by eight hundred kilometers? That's gonna save so much time and money for logistics.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The distance from Astana to Aktau will be reduced by 800 kilometers, and from Khorgos to Aktau by 900 kilometers.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. And Minister Karabayev mentioned 24 infrastructure projects totaling 1.9 trillion tenge. The scale is just enormous.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. And Minister Karabayev mentioned twenty four infrastructure projects totaling one point nine trillion tenge. The scale is just enormous.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to Transport Minister Marat Karabayev, 24 infrastructure projects worth 1.9 trillion tenge are being implemented in the region.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It really feels like they're pushing hard to make Kazakhstan a key Eurasian hub. Tokayev's really stressing the strategic importance.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It really feels like they're pushing hard to make Kazakhstan a key Eurasian hub. Tokayev's really stressing the strategic importance.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: He stressed that the Mangystau region has significant potential for Kazakhstan to become a transport and logistics hub of Eurasia. Achieving this goal is of strategic importance, the press service added.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, he wrapped up by telling them to speed up that airport construction too. No time to waste, I guess.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, he wrapped up by telling them to speed up that airport construction too. No time to waste, I guess.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Head of State instructed officials to speed up the construction of the airport in the Kenderli resort zone.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Makes you wonder how this'll shift trade dynamics in the region long-term.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Makes you wonder how this'll shift trade dynamics in the region long-term.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. Big moves happening out there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. Big moves happening out there.
